title: Wife Wanted
description: FINDING MS. RIGHTTycoon Joe Dillon thought applying business principles to his personal life was the logical way to find his ideal mate. And his public advertising campaign did net him eight thousand willing applicants. But all those trilingual brunettes looked bland when Brit Alexander stormed onto the scene.Sure Brit was blond and had flunked Spanish, but suddenly Joe didn't care about his requirements; he cared about Brit. Unfortunately Brit had built her career doing workshops on how to be happily single--and associating with a man who'd made national news with some ridiculous wife hunt was the last thing she intended to do .....
author: Terri Herrington
